fluent.translation[0].definitions[0].def: able to speak a language very well
fluent.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: She was fluent in English, French, and German.
fluent.translation[0].definitions[1].def: fluent speech or writing is smooth and confident, with no mistakes
fluent.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: He was a fluent and rapid prose writer.
fluent.translation[0].definitions[2].def: fluent movements are smooth and gentle, not sudden and sharp
fluent.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: She rose with the fluent movement of an athlete.
